title: Consequence: The Aftermath
description: "CONSEQUENCE": the aftermath is the sequel to "I Cried, You Didn't Listen". It is the story of the 'few' incarcerated children who 'survived' the California Youth Authority's 'Training camps'; only to become societies 'worst nightmares'. It is the 'sunset' of life for those who "Innocent until 'Made' Guilty". Dwight Edward Abbott; A.K.A. "Sonny" died in his Prison cell on August 8, 2020. Now He cries No More! R.I.P. my Brother! Love, Skippy
author: Dwight Edgar Abbott
